    • getRecords

      public java.util.ArrayList<Citizen> getRecords()
      Method to get the records of Citizens to be used in the GUI

      Returns:
      A HashMap of the names

    • addExisting

      public void addExisting()
      Method to add existing records from the file

    • registerBirth

      public void registerBirth​(char gender, int yob, java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String mName, java.lang.String lName)
      Method to register the birth of a Citizen
      creates a new citizen obj for when they are born sets thier life status to '0' (alive) adds the new citizen to the records arrayList
      Parameters:
      gender - A character representing the person's gender
      yob - An integer representing the person's year of birth
      fName - A String representing the person's firs name
      mName - A String representing the person's middle name
      lName - A String representing the person's last name

    • registerDeath

      public void registerDeath​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String causeOfDeath, java.lang.String dateOfDeath, java.lang.String placeOfDeath)
      method to register death of a person
      a CivicDoc is created theat contains the information about the persons death
      retreives the Citizen information form records by the use of thier id
      then adds the deathDeatails to persons Civicdoc
      Parameters:
      id - citizen id
      causeOfDeath - how they died
      dateOfDeath - the date in which they died
      placeOfDeath - the place they were pronouced dead

    • registerMarriage

      public void registerMarriage​(java.lang.String groomId, java.lang.String brideId, java.lang.String marriageDate)
      Method to register two Citizens' marriage.
      The marriage between two individuals is recorded in the papers arraylist in the citizen class
      Additionally, the bride's last name is set to the groom's last name
      Parameters:
      groomId - The id of the groom
      brideId - The id of the bride
      marriageDate - The date of marriage

    • addParentData

      public void addParentData​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String fatherId, java.lang.String motherId)
      Method to add parentData to a citizen
      finds the index of the citizen and their parent(s) id and stores them as obj
      set the parent of the citizen if the id is found and updates the citezen records, else thorws an IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      id - The citizen's id
      fatherId - The father's id
      motherId - The mother's id

    • getFather

      public java.lang.String getFather​(java.lang.String id)
      Method to get the Citizen's father.
      get father's position using the idSearch method and returns the father's details if his ID exsits
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Citizen
      Returns:
      A formatted String representing the father's details

    • getMother

      public java.lang.String getMother​(java.lang.String id)
      Method to get the Citizen's mother get mother's position using the idSearch method and returns the mother's details if his ID exsits
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Citizen
      Returns:
      A formatted String representing the Citizen's mother's details

    • updateAddress

      public void updateAddress​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String town, java.lang.String parish, java.lang.String country)
      Method to update the address of the citizen
      This works alongside the private idSearch method to find the Citizen then update their address based on their id
      Parameters:
      id - A String representing id of the Citizen
      street - A String representing the street the Citizen lives on
      town - A String representing the town the Citizen resides in
      parish - A String representing the parish the Citizen resides in
      country - A String representing the country the Citizen resides in

    • mailingLabel

      public java.lang.String mailingLabel​(java.lang.String id)
      Method to return a mailing label of a citizen
      This works by using the idSearch method to find the Citizen, and then the respective getters for the Citizen are utilized to retrieve the information
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the citizen
      Returns:
      A formatted String containing the individual's name and adddress

    • displayCitizenDetails

      public java.lang.String displayCitizenDetails​(java.lang.String id)

    • search

      public java.lang.String search​(java.lang.String id)
      search method
      checks to see if the id exist if not the returns and empty string if id is found, it retives the persons info from records arrayList
      Parameters:
      id - The Citizen's id that's being searched
      Returns:
      A formatted String containing individuals ID, gender and full name

    • search

      public java.lang.String[] search​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      search by name method
      Binary search from nameSearch() is used to find citezen from list with the name entered
      Parameters:
      firstName - nameSearch
      lastName - nameSearch
      Returns:
      A a string list that contains the persons ID, gender and full name
